definition: to place in a line or arrange so as to be parallel or straight
details:
verb
- to place in a line or arrange so as to be parallel or straight
= example: to place in a line or arrange so as to be parallel or straight
= synonyms: adjust
- to bring components or parts into proper or desirable coordination correlation
= example: to bring components or parts into proper or desirable coordination correlation
= synonyms: coordinate
- to be or come into adjustment with
= example: to be or come into adjustment with
